On Mon, 20 Sep 2004 13:18:02 -0400, Rod Gonzaga <rgonzaga@...>  
wrote:

> I am interested in running automatic periodic tests using JUnit and
> Nagios. Has anyone had experience with this? Perhaps a Nagios plugin
> already exists to integrate JUnit testing?

I've never heard of one existing.

It isn't clear to me what you want to do here.  Do you want a command in  
your Nagios config that will run a certain set of tests?  If so, what is  
the perceived benefit?

I really am curious about this, I am not trying to poke holes.  I never  
considered doing something like this and would like to know what your  
UseCase is.

Thanks.

--
